name: Paleo Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: NYJEN
summary: Finally a paleo-friendly chocolate chip cookie that tastes like a traditional one. Gluten-, grain-, and dairy-free!
ingredients: ¼ cup dairy-free and gluten-free chocolate chips (such as Enjoy Life®)
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper
Whisk almond butter, honey, egg, baking soda, vanilla extract, and salt together in a bowl; fold in chocolate chips
Drop batter, about 2 tablespoons per cookie, onto the prepared baking sheet about 1 1/2 inches apart
Bake in the preheated oven until edges start to crisp, 8 to 10 minutes
Cool cookies on baking sheet for 10 minutes before removing
